string-array.name: film_descriptions
string-array.item: Convicted of a crime he didn\'t commit, banker Andy Dufresne is sent to Shawshank Prison, where he befriends an older inmate and finds hope despite the grim circumstances.
The Godfather follows the powerful Italian-American crime family of Don Vito Corleone, who, when bequeathing his empire to his reluctant son Michael, triggers a series of unfortunate events.
In Gotham City, Batman battles a new villain known as The Joker, a sadistic mastermind with a warped sense of humor, while confronting demons from his own past.

Dom Cobb is a professional thief specializing in stealing secrets from people\'s subconscious while they dream. He is offered a chance at redemption by performing the near-impossible act of inception.
An insomniac white-collar worker named Jack meets a soap salesman named Tyler Durden, and together they form a fight club as a form of male bonding and societal critique.
